nodes.text: A holoplaque was a device capable of displaying a still holographic image. In 8 ABY,[source?] Captain Keleman Ciro, commanding officer of the New Republic CR90 corvette FarStar, used a holoplaque to capture an image of the vessel's command crew just prior to the start of their mission to track down the rogue Imperial warlord Moff Kentor Sarne.
The holoplaque is mentioned in the RPG adventure Omens, published in The DarkStryder Campaign by West End Games in 1995.
